intent: Review Go code and identify issues with actionable suggestions

success_criteria.primary: Identifies the unused variable issue in the sample code

must_identify: Go compiler will fail on this (unused variables are errors)
must_provide: Clear explanation of why this is an issue
Specific fix: remove the line, use the variable, or use blank identifier
should_also_note: Variable x is used but initialized to zero (may be intentional)

quality_rubric.accuracy: Correctly identifies the issue type and location
quality_rubric.actionability: Reviewer could fix based on this feedback
